articles.title: Jacksonville 8-year-old dies from coronavirus-related syndrome, family says - WJXT News4JAX
articles.description: Friends and family are mourning the loss of an 8-year-old Jacksonville girl after she died early Saturday morning from a COVID-19-related syndrome.
